metadata.Title: CVE-2017-17502 on Ubuntu 18.04 LTS (bionic) - medium
metadata.Description:
ReadCMYKImage in coders/cmyk.c in GraphicsMagick 1.3.26 has amagick/import.c ImportCMYKQuantumType heap-based buffer over-read via acrafted file.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2017-17502` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

graphicsmagick - 1.3.27-1
graphicsmagick-imagemagick-compat - 1.3.27-1
libgraphics-magick-perl - 1.3.27-1
libgraphicsmagick++-q16-12 - 1.3.27-1
libgraphicsmagick-q16-3 - 1.3.27-1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: graphicsmagick package in bionic, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '1.3.27-1').
